QRScanner
This class is used to scan QR codes using the google code scanner for android Pass an instance of context when making the object and call the scanQRCode method to start the scanning process The method returns the raw value of the QR code
QRScanner.QRCodeScanCallback
 
ScannerFragment
This Fragment hosts our QR Scanner for users to scan QR codes.
